head.citation-title: 2nd International Workshop on Computer Graphics, Computer Vision and Mathematics, GraVisMa 2010 - Workshop Proceedings
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 24 papers. The topics discussed include: a geometric algebra algorithm compiler, Germany; efficient multi-scale curvature and crease estimation; advances in metric-neutral visualization; fast GPU-based image warping and in painting for frame interpolation; registration of multichannel images using geometric algebra; fast approximation of the shape diameter function; multi-resolution morse complexes in arbitrary dimensions; using geometric algebra for visualizing integration curves; automatic texture classification of metallographic images by Gabor filter; parallelization of a method for detecting non-stationary photometric perturbations in projection screens with CUDA; reconsidering and rethinking quaternionic special relativity; impact crater detection on mars digital elevation and image model; and development of human interface software in our dental surgical system based on mixed reality.

source.sourcetitle-abbrev: Int. Workshop Comput. Graph., Comput. Vis. Math., GraVisMa - Workshop Proc.
